text: In all your ways be mindful of Him and he will make straight your paths. Proverbs 3:6

People like @AdyBarkan are what this fight against the #GOPTaxScam are all about. We can defeat this horrific piece of legislation, but only if everyone stands up and fights back. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DRH9oEHWkAAFdvJ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/941812005945724930/vid/240x240/Cd7quzgi_7ENkgJA.mp4

Vulnerable.
Entitlement.
Diversity.
Transgender.
Fetus.
Evidence-based.
Science-based.

What do these words have in common? They were all banned by the Trump Administration for use in any CDC official budget documents. It’s downright ridiculous. 
https://www.washingtonpost.com/national/health-science/cdc-gets-list-of-forbidden-words-fetus-transgender-diversity/2017/12/15/f503837a-e1cf-11e7-89e8-edec16379010_story.html
RT @dcexaminer Religious schools, homeschoolers to get a boost in GOP tax plan, thanks to Ted Cruz and Mike Pence https://trib.al/qiCXut2 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DRLj3YZVwAAbyJm.jpg

Pleased the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act conference report includes my Student Opportunity Amendment that will allow families to use 529 plans on K-12 education expenses for public, private, and religious schools, and homeschooling. https://twitter.com/gopsenfinance/status/941815356808503296 QT @GOPSenFinance NEWS: Chairmen @SenOrrinHatch and @RepKevinBrady release #taxreform conference committee report. https://www.finance.senate.gov/chairmans-news/tax-cuts-and-jobs-act-moves-to-house-and-senate-floor-for-full-vote http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DRIAEakX4AEVWdo.jpg
RT @dcexaminer Religious schools, homeschoolers to get a boost in GOP tax plan, thanks to Ted Cruz and Mike Pence https://trib.al/O3NUz7m http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DRMAc9WX0AABo-K.jpg

Glad to see my Student Opportunity Amendment included in the conference tax plan. A HUGE step in the right direction for #SchoolChoice! http://www.washingtonexaminer.com/religious-schools-homeschoolers-to-get-a-boost-in-gop-tax-plan-thanks-to-ted-cruz-and-mike-pence/article/2643722

The latest tax bill is just as bad as the previous versions: Deep permanent tax cuts for corporations, while the middle class is left behind. It’s up to us to try and stop this bill. 
https://twitter.com/NPR/status/941826206185295872 QT @NPR The corporate tax cuts in the GOP tax bill are permanent, while the individual cuts are set to expire in 2025. https://www.npr.org/2017/12/15/571174443/rubio-corker-gives-thumbs-up-to-tax-bill-clearing-roadblock-to-passage-by-christ?utm_source=twitter.com&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=npr&utm_term=nprnews&utm_content=2044

#ClimateChange causes displacement across Africa, forcing people to flee their homes because of droughts, flooding, or other natural disasters. By 2050, as many as 250 million Africans will be impacted by water stress alone. http://www.bbc.com/news/world-africa-42250230?utm_content=buffera5a42&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter.com&utm_campaign=buffer

Republicans released their thousand page tax bill around 5:30 p.m. yesterday. They want to vote on it early next week. That barely gives Senators enough time to go over the bill, let alone have constituents weigh in.

15,000 people are displaced every day inside African countries. The Democratic Republic of Congo, for the second year in a row, has the highest number of displaced people in the world – ahead of Syria and Iraq. https://reliefweb.int/report/world/2017-africa-report-internal-displacement?utm_content=bufferbf07e&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter.com&utm_campaign=buffer

My advice to girls at the @LAPromiseFund yesterday: continue to raise your hand. When you see others in need, go out of your way to lift them up. Stand up and speak out, because you can make a difference. 
https://medium.com/@KamalaHarris/a-room-full-of-leaders-8d9462154044

As I said to girls at @LAPromiseFund, it’s a sign of strength to seek out role models and mentors. None of us, and myself included, has achieved success without people who invested in us and made us believe we could do anything and helped us along the way.

Alabama voters deserve to have their voices heard in the tax plan fight. Doug Jones should be seated in the U.S. Senate before we vote on the new bill. https://secure.kamalaharris.org/page/s/seat-doug-jones?source=tw171213
